title: Equity crowdfunding certificates (StartEngine, Wefunder, Republic)
dataVerified: Investor name, company, share amount, valuation, investment date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake equity certificates. Domain binding verifies crowdfunding platform. Tamper-evident ownership record. SEC Regulation CF/A+ compliance. Shareholder cap table integrity. High-value securities. Permanent ownership proof.
